website_summaries.verdict: Solid price point and a wide range of digestive disorders treated make this a solid and effective choice.
pros: Showed marked improvement in symptoms of leaky gut and Hashimoto's Thyroidism, as well as Crohn's Disease and other digestive disorders
cons: Caused some bloating and gas in some, while others reported flare-ups with food allergies and sensitivities

customer_reviews.title: Ten Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would give this product ten stars if I could. My husband has severe Crohn's Disease and has suffered terribly over the years. His Dr told him the next step would be hospice. He's terminal. This product has caused the disease to go into remission. my husband is doing so much better with this formula. It's amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: V. W

customer_reviews.title: Leaky Gut/Hashimotos
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product and it's a great value for the price. I bought this to help treat leaky gut and Hashimoto's Thyroidism. Anyone with mysteriously declining health and brain fog should read the books "Why Isn't My Brain Working" and "The Root Cause: Hashimoto's" which both give a good description of the uses of this product.
customer_reviews.author: CollegeDormLife

customer_reviews.title: Formula seems to be changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing this item for the last several years and it was a wonderful substitute for the Florastar. Suddenly within the last 3 orders that has changed, It no longer works. Oddly enough, I had some left over from a bottle I purchased last year and I took some of those, just to see if maybe it was just me, but the old pills worked perfect.. If you read many recent reviews, It seems that many people have found that this no longer works and I wonder if they have changed the formula. Like the others I am back to florstar.
customer_reviews.author: ditchqueen

customer_reviews.title: I really like this probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I really like this probiotic. I recommended this to my daughter who has had severe constipation problems for years (not able to go for a week at a time) She has tried more fiber in the diet and everything imaginable. These pills helped her immediately. They are not a laxative but help the digestive tract and stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Bird

customer_reviews.title: One big disadvantage!
customer_reviews.text: I have had chronic diarrhea for decades. Multiple colonoscopies,biopsies-no Crohn's ,no Colitis. A Dr recommended this when I was on Keflex. Bingo! So to make my life more friendly-I have kept taking it! Only warning I have --the gas is the nastiest ,foulest smell ever! WOW I choke myself! Maybe I will try every other day so I do not destroy what is left of the ozone !
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Nikesch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Cures most digestive troubles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Excellent product. Cures most digestive troubles I’ve spent thousands on products for stomach illness and I’m very knowledgeable about probiotics. This is the best. No need to refrigerate. And it survives stomach acid. So you get 10 times the amount to where you need it (small and large intestine.)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky 111

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I have recently started taking this product at the suggestion of my doctor. It is a wonderful product and the price here is equally as wonderful---I paid much more for it through my doctor's office and was thrilled when I searched here to price check. Many of the more serious gut issues I have had, like constant heartburn causing me to eat Tums like candy, is all but gone. Gut bloating is almost a thing of the past as well for me. And this is all after just using one bottle of these probiotics. I am hopeful that this will continue and that it will continue to help improve my overall health.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Kate

customer_reviews.title: Cured My Yeast Infections
customer_reviews.text: CURED!! I have been trying to beat Candida for over 6 years after treating Lyme disease for years with antibiotics. SB finally did the trick BUT... not the traditional way. I had to do daily retention enemas for a few weeks to beat my chronic yeast issues. For some reason these do not reach the colon in the numbers you need when taken orally.
customer_reviews.author: M--G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as help to curb my cravings for sugar. it helps and slowly I'm losing weight.
customer_reviews.author: shakespeare

customer_reviews.title: The BEST probiotic
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff! It’s really the best and has been a life saver in helping my gut/ cystic acne. I take one a day preferably every night with a warm cup of lemon water and honey or a daily detox tea then drink 8-16 of water behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Paul

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for preventing GI upset from antibiotics
customer_reviews.text: I take this yeast probiotic along with the bacterial probiotics. Does an excellent job, especially to prevent gastric side effects of antibiotics. A few years ago, when faced with an h-pylori infection I was reluctant to take the strong antibiotics, as they have only an 80% cure rate and high susceptibility for GI bacterial infection, including c-diff, which is almost impossible to cure and can be fatal. But some online research revealed that taking s. Boulardii during and after antibiotic treatment increased h- pylori cure to 100%. I took s. Boulardii along with regular probiotics during the antibiotic phase and for several months after. The h-pylori was totally cured with no GI side effects.
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Good insurance policy
customer_reviews.text: After getting wiped out by taking Augmentin, I found that it could result in a dangerous C diff infection and more antibiotics. I researched preventative probiotics for C diff, and found information stating that when Sacc B is wiped out, it allows C diff to proliferate. This is apparently a risk for 8 weeks after taking Augmentin. I began taking these 10 weeks ago, and I'm healthy. Good insurance policy.
customer_reviews.author: mike austin

customer_reviews.title: Diff that would not get better with prescription drugs and this got my go system ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed to get my gut back on track. I had severe gastroenteritis on Easter (yes, months ago) and haven’t been the same since. I’ve been take Culturelle and eating tons of yogurt but this is what I’ve needed. I took this before, about 7 years ago, when I had c. Diff that would not get better with prescription drugs and this got my go system back to normal. It’s ingredient is similar to Florastar (which is very expensive) so I’m delighted at the affordability and efficacy of the Jason brand.
customer_reviews.author: ReikiCara

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended on a website about SSRI withdrawal
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from having taken SSRI's for twenty plus years. Trying to re-colonize my gut to make its own serotonin. This was recommended on a website about SSRI withdrawal. Seems to be doing what is supposed to. Also using Culterelle probiotics and massive quantities of fish oil. Its been 2 months since stopping meds-certainly feeling better than I did at first. I consider this to be a win, compared to some stories I read about withdrawal lasting years.
customer_reviews.author: C. Toth

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of problems with my stomach the worse is C-dif. I use this to try to keep it under control.

customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product for awhile, but this latest order came in and the product is giving me extreme bloating and pain when I take it. I contacted the product complaint hotline and was never contacted by Jarrow Formulas. This is a shoddy lot and is possibly dangerous to take -- buyer beware. I read some other critical reviews that found that the formula has changed. That seems to be my experience.
customer_reviews.author: jason goldman

customer_reviews.title: Hard to know how much it helps.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is helping but just a few days ago I started getting irritated bladder again. Or some call it bladder spasms. It’s been a few months since the last bout. I will continue to take this and hope it helps!
customer_reviews.author: J. Daily

customer_reviews.title: Help for your gut
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who was diagnosed with Cronhs disease and was put on a few medications that landed him in the ER. Cronhs is often misdiagnosed. I decided to become proactive and put him on probiotics and slippery elm. He is doing great. I was a buyer for whole foods and jarrow became of of my favorite companies and one I knew I could trust. You can't go wrong with Jarrow and their probiotics are the only ones I buy
customer_reviews.author: judianne

customer_reviews.title: Surprised My Doctor!
customer_reviews.text: Healed from C-diff. It's the only one that worked! My doctor was really surprised that I didn't have to struggle for months on end!

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Defective product, results as mentioned in these miraculous reviews are exaggerated. I used this product for 2 weeks, after 4 days felt slight stomach pain followed by constipation, bloating. Their customer service is rude and biased towards the customer inquiring about the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. R.

customer_reviews.title: Poop at appropriate intervals.
customer_reviews.text: Pooping too much and pooping not enough are both undesirable. If you find that travel causes pooping at far-too-frequent intervals, this might be fore you! Also - compare this to Florastor. Then buy this instead and have a laugh. Remarkable weapon against the trots, and at a MUCH more reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Warning!
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! This has MOS in it. MOS is a prebiotic. Probiotics not only feed good bacteria, but also BAD bacteria. If you’re taking probiotics for digestive issues like SIBO, then you need to know that this will make your issues worse! Any probiotic which also has a prebiotic (MOS, FOS, insulin, Jerusalem artichoke, etc) will feed your bad bacteria as well. No one tells you this. Sadly, this escaped me when I bought this. After one pill, I realized my mistake. Unfortunately, it said I can’t return this product, I’m out the money. Don’t make my mistake. It might work great for other who don’t have SIBO or other digestive issues, but it made mine worse again.
customer_reviews.author: BDog

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Change on how my body functions lol
customer_reviews.text: when I went to my gyno doctor she told me about these pills and every since I started taking these pills, my body has changed in only positive ways! my sacred temple has never functioned better ! I swear every since I started taking them I haven't gotten sick not once. even when I haven't been dressed appropriately for this frigid weather in new York. absolutely love this product !!!!! I have recommended it to everyone of my friends and family. this is something I will buy for the rest of my life.

customer_reviews.title: H. Pylori be gone!
customer_reviews.text: After a lot of reading, stumbled upon this probiotic, supposedly specifically designed to rid h.pylori from the lining of the stomach. I would like to think that this product helped to get rid of those little buggers, as the test came back negative. I also paired this with mastic gum caplets from Greece, as well as chewed on the Elma sugar free chewing gum with mastic. Supposed to build good gut flora as well.

customer_reviews.title: I had IBS.  Now I don't.
customer_reviews.text: I've struggled with IBS for 10 years. Upper GIs, lower GIs, biopsies, FODMAP diets...anything to try and counteract horrible diarrhea and urgency that made me afraid to leave the house! Finally, a dietitian recommended another brand of Saccharomyces Boulardii and it helped a lot. It was very expensive, so I came to amazon for a less expensive solution. Not only is this formulation the very best I've tried (I literally no longer have IBS) but the packaging, which featured insulation and dry ice, surpassed anything I've ever seen in receiving any supplement through the mail. I'd feel confident ordering it in any climate zone due to the care they put into packaging. Highly recommend!

My mom, sister & daughter also take this supplement.

After taking it every day for three weeks, the effects have been good -- he complains much less about stomachaches, he's more "regular" (sorry if TMI, but this is a probiotic we're reviewing here after all), and we've noticed no ill effects. So, yes, we think it "works" and is a quality supplement: Recommended.

product_meta.title: Saccharomyces Boulardii + MOS, 5 Billion Organisms Per Cap, for Intestinal and Digestive Support, 90 Count (Cool Ship, Pack of 3)
product_meta.description: Size:90 Count (Pack of 3)Saccharomyces Boulardii+MOS contains a probiotic yeast that survives passage through stomach acid and delivers its benefits to the intestinal tract. This strain helps protect and maintain a normal intestinal microflora. It also works to restore the normal intestinal microflora when possible disruptions may occur, such as, during the intake of certain medications and during travel. MOS (MannanOligoSaccharides) is an oligosaccharide from the cell walls of S.cerevisiae that can discourage bacteria from adhering to the epithelial cells and reduce their proliferation. Saccharomyces Boulardii+MOS does not require refrigeration and can be stored at room temperature. Refrigeration will, however, extend the shelf life. Avoid temperatures above 77°F (25°C). The cool ship process creates a custom fulfillment pathway so that probiotic products are kept refrigerated up until the point they are shipped. The products are packed in a unique cool ship box that utilizes insulation made with sustainable cotton fiber and cooled with reusable ice packs. The products are then fulfilled with either next day or second day shipping. This process delivers probiotics that have been kept cool and, in most cases, not exposed to prolonged extreme heat, supporting the highest levels of product potency.
feature_bullets: One of the Best Substantiated Probiotics
Can Be Taken with Bacterial Probiotics
3 Units Cool Shipped with Sustainable Insulation and Reusable Ice Packs
